comment: From "mai nahi aa raha, kal mera astro ka exam hai" to "chalo city chalte hai, bhaad me jaye exam", you've learnt to chill out. But still a certified overthinker for friendship related problems. Thanks for being "kushautan" and also being there on breakfast 🙌🏻. 🫂
name: Riya

comment: Amazon mai PPO milne ka ghamand hai Bhai ko!! Pure placement season sota raha bas Mandir aur bhagwan ke bharose baitha tha! Mote, Hyderabad mai vazan kam karna apna😂😂
name: Sahil Rapartiwar

comment: My hug partner, Caring, most loved person in our grp, bhaii bahut miss krunga, patte khelnge without walk, "main sabme in hu lekin patte..", tere fav business bhi khelenge, amazon me pakka koi mil jayegi, OT max, "kaan me doba lagakr ghumta rehta h". meri relationship zinda h sirf tere vajah se. 🥺
name: Rounak Jain

comment: Hello fellow 405ian(guess not so much🙃) A carefree guy, always jolly and cool, Valo pro and ex CyberSec head, Will always remember how an Internship offer made u a loyal & regular mandir visitor. Enjoyed listening to our common playlists while in flat. All the best for Amazon buddy, keep in touch!
name: Abhinav Yadav

comment: Motee!! PRO third wheeler + Atsro talks wala saathi . Apan dono akele sec B wale 😂😂😂 pata ni kaise nikala h online phase .Trips ready h hyderbad se , Milky Way dekhenge toh saath mai hi .🫂🫂 Baaki mobile chalana kam karde .🤬
name: Harsh Parihar

comment: Are Moti. Mera F1 dekhne wala iklota bhai. Or bhai kal se GYM toh aayega na tu? The best moments spent in HYD and SPITI. Bohot daring h sala g@*nd toh fatti hi nhi h. 4 saal hogye lekin fir bhi bandi nhi bana paya 😂. Har jagah ladki taadna band krde. Lob u bro. Will miss the sax-sux.
name: Soham Roy

comment:
Pro Third Wheeler and Walk Enthusiast DJ Kushu

One of the best peeps in college 🙌

comment: Breakfast bro? Chotu-10 min😂Walk?In.Ktna jyda vibe kre h apn hmesha. Frm bhola to motu kushal, hyd m jake shyd behn hone ka frz nibhaungi(iykyk)😂us din city ane k liye ty. BF k time apni mst gossips aur late night gossips including lake p roasting session, sb continue rkhenge HYD m, done bro?🤜🤛

comment: Haan bhai Mandir chalte hain. Kaafi talented aur aalsi banda.

comment: "Bhai hamesha apan dono hi sabse nalle kese rehte h"😂. One of the most positive and knowledgeable friends I've made in college. Kan me 2 gote leke bas ghumne boldo sale ko, tere sath walks or deep-talks bohot miss karunga bro 🥲🫂. Tab tu nhi hota to shayad aaj ppo na hota, thanks a lot bhai 😘.
name: Sarvagya Kanungo

comment: Sleeping, Reels dekhna, aur Walk, sums up your BTech. Bhot maze aaye yr apni valo gang ke sath bas ab to Hyd. mai continue krni h bkchodi. Cyber security expert, patla ho jana foreign jane se pehle 🤣🤣 All the best bhai, trip krni h ab next. Bhot journey baaki h sath mai, be the same calm, lazy guy

comment:
2 saal tak CSE ka Banda smjhti thi, made many beautiful memories with you, campus walks, POD meteor shower, helping me always, and dinner ke liye msg krne ke liye thanks😂
P.S. walk pe chaloge wali playlist ki link pls
name: NAIN GUPTA

comment: The Moti gaand jo always Aryan ke room peh ulti hoke leti rehti hai. Bhai you are the easiest doctor to manipulate in mafia😂 Have fun and thanks for the goal video. DayOne ka T-shirt change Karle ab toh….
name: S Shrevesh

comment: Aur Chotuuuu!! Group mein one of the very few people jiska taste in food and movies actual mein decent ho. Dil ka saaf banda, always nalla and in for every plan! Bhai humesha aise gaane sunte sunte vibe krte reh aur khush reh! Amazon mein toxic logo se bachke, koi faayda na utha le..

comment: Bhai ki ppo aur intern mandir se.lagi thi. Apan shed hub banayenge hyderbad me aur gaming room to apna fixed hai hi. Mote full hyderbad ghumenge har weekend. Going to be fun.
